items.title: What Maduro’s ouster means for Trump’s mass deportation campaign
items.description: Trump said many Venezuelan immigrants “want to go back.” Will Maduro’s removal spark a return — or another exodus?

items.title: How Trump’s foreign intervention could shake up the midterm elections
items.description: Democrats immediately argued that U.S. military action in Venezuela was an abandonment of the president’s promise to focus on improving lives at home.

items.title: Rubio takes on most challenging role yet: Viceroy of Venezuela
items.description: The top U.S. diplomat has pushed for regime change for over a decade. Now the hard part begins.
